09B.F.summary: lastminute.com N.V. operates in the online travel industry in Italy, Spain, the United Kingdom, France, Germany, and internationally. The company operates through Online Travel Agency (OTA), Meta-search, Media, and Other segments. It provides mobile apps and websites in approximately 17 languages and 40 countries, which enable travelers to search, compare, and book flights, vacation packages and cruises, hotel accommodations, car rentals, and other travel products and services. The company also directs traffic from its websites to the sites of the OTAs, airlines, and other direct providers. It operates as a seller of web based advertising spaces and media contents primarily on OTA platforms, web sites, and third party partners available spaces. Its primary brands include lastminute.com, Bravofly, Rumbo, Jetcost, Hotelscan, Volagratis, Crocierissime, Viajar, weg.de, Madfish, HolidayiQ, and Crocierissime. The company was formerly known as Bravofly Rumbo Group N.V. and changed its name to lastminute.com N.V. in May 2015. lastminute.com N.V. was founded in 2004 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

32P.F.summary: PPHE Hotel Group Limited owns, develops, leases, operates, and franchises full-service upscale and lifestyle hotels in the Netherlands, Germany, Hungary, Serbia, Croatia, and the United Kingdom. It owns and operates hotels and resorts under the Park Plaza, the art'otel, and the Arena Campsites brands, as well as the Arena Hotels & Apartments. As of December 30, 2020, the company owned/operated 37 hotels and resorts with approximately 8,800 rooms; and 8 campsites offering approximately 6,000 units in central London. It also operates restaurants and bars; and coffee shop and Spa. The company was formerly known as Park Plaza Hotels Limited and changed its name to PPHE Hotel Group Limited in March 2012. PPHE Hotel Group Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

8GV.F.summary: GrandVision N.V., together with its subsidiaries, operates optical retail chains in the France, Germany, the United Kingdom, and internationally. The company offers a range of optical services; prescription glasses, such as frames and lenses; contact lenses; sunglasses comprising plain and with prescription lenses; and eyecare products. It operates under various retail banners, including Apollo-Optik in Germany; GÃ©nÃ©rale d'Optique and GrandOptical in France; Pearle in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Austria; Eye Wish Opticiens in the Netherlands; and Vision Express in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Poland, Hungary, the Middle East, and India. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated approximately 7,260 optical retail stores, including franchise stores. The company also provides eye testing, examinations, and diagnostics services. It sells its products under the DbyD, Fuzion, Heritage, Miki Ninn, Seen, Sensaya, Unofficial, Eyexpert, and iWear brand names. The company was founded in 1891 and is headquartered in Schiphol, the Netherlands. GrandVision N.V. is a subsidiary of HAL Optical Investments B.V.

8TI.F.summary: Stellantis N.V. engages in the design, engineering, manufacture, distribution, and sale of passenger vehicles, pickup trucks, SUVs, and light commercial vehicles worldwide. It offers luxury, premium, and mainstream vehicles, as well as financial services, and parts and services; and provides retail and dealer financing, leasing, and rental services. The company offers its products under the Abarth, Alfa Romeo, Chrysler, Dodge, Fiat, Fiat Professional, Jeep, Maserati, Opel, Ram, Free2Move, CitroÃ«n, DS Automobiles, Lancia, Mopar, Peugeot, Vauxhall, and Leasys brands. The company sells its products directly, as well as through distributors and dealers. Stellantis N.V. was founded in 1899 and is based in Lijnden, the Netherlands.

ACCEL.AS.summary: Accell Group N.V. designs, develops, produces, markets, and markets bicycles, and bicycle parts and accessories. It sells its products under the Lapierre, Haibike, Raleigh, Carqon, Sparta, XLC, Batavus, Ghost, Babboe, Winora, Koga, Van Nicholas, Loekie, Atala, Bike Parts, Juncker, Carraro Cicli, Nishiki, and Tunturi brands in the Netherlands, Germany, other European countries, and internationally. The company serves dealers and consumers. Accell Group N.V. is headquartered in Heerenveen, the Netherlands.

ACGPF.summary: Accell Group N.V. designs, develops, produces, markets, and markets bicycles, and bicycle parts and accessories. It sells its products under the Lapierre, Haibike, Raleigh, Carqon, Sparta, XLC, Batavus, Ghost, Babboe, Winora, Koga, Van Nicholas, Loekie, Atala, Bike Parts, Juncker, Carraro Cicli, Nishiki, and Tunturi brands in the Netherlands, Germany, other European countries, and internationally. The company serves dealers and consumers. Accell Group N.V. is headquartered in Heerenveen, the Netherlands.

AJAX.AS.summary: AFC Ajax NV operates a football club primarily in the Netherlands. The company also operates a stadium and an youth academy. In addition, it sells tickets online. The company was founded in 1900 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

AJXA.F.summary: AFC Ajax NV operates a football club primarily in the Netherlands. The company also operates a stadium and an youth academy. In addition, it sells tickets online. The company was founded in 1900 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

ALPER.PA.summary: La Perla Fashion Holding N.V. designs, manufactures, and retails luxury lingerie, underwear, nightwear, and swimwear. It offers its products for women and men. The company markets its products through retail and wholesale channels under the La Perla brand. It operates through 70 boutiques, including 44 own and 26 partner-operated boutiques; 40 department stores with shop-in-shops and concessions; 24 outlet stores; and various digital sales platforms, including laperla.com and other third-party operated platforms. The company was formerly known as Glow Media N.V. and changed its name to La Perla Fashion Holding N.V. in May 2018. La Perla Fashion Holding N.V. was founded in 1954 and is based in Schiphol, the Netherlands.

ALX.AS.summary: Alumexx N.V. manufactures and sells scaffoldings, stairs, ladders, accessories, and spare parts. Its products include indoor, outdoor, and folding scaffoldings, as well as other jetties. The company was formerly known as Phelix N.V. and changed its name to Alumexx N.V. in January 2018. Alumexx N.V. was founded in 1991 and is based in Etten-Leur, the Netherlands.

AO1B.DE.summary: Accell Group N.V. designs, develops, produces, markets, and markets bicycles, and bicycle parts and accessories. It sells its products under the Lapierre, Haibike, Raleigh, Carqon, Sparta, XLC, Batavus, Ghost, Babboe, Winora, Koga, Van Nicholas, Loekie, Atala, Bike Parts, Juncker, Carraro Cicli, Nishiki, and Tunturi brands in the Netherlands, Germany, other European countries, and internationally. The company serves dealers and consumers. Accell Group N.V. is headquartered in Heerenveen, the Netherlands.

The company serves dealers and consumers. Accell Group N.V. is headquartered in Heerenveen, the Netherlands.

AUV.HM.summary: autowerkstatt group N.V. operates as a franchise concept for independent car repair shops in Germany. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Waalre, the Netherlands.

B4F.F.summary: Basic-Fit N.V. operates fitness clubs in the Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, France, and Spain. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 905 fitness clubs. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Hoofddorp, the Netherlands.

BBED.AS.summary: Beter Bed Holding N.V. operates as a retail- and wholesale organization in the bedroom furnishing sector. It offers beds, box springs, mattresses, bed bases, and bed textiles to consumers through its retail stores and web shops, as well as provides home delivery services. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 151 stores under the Beter Bed, Beddenreus, and SÃ¤ngjÃ¤tten brands. It also markets a range of sleeping systems under the M line, Wave, Iconic, and Maxi brands through international wholesale network, and B2C, B2B, and B2B2C channels. The company operates in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Sweden. Beter Bed Holding N.V. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Uden, the Netherlands.

BBQ.F.summary: Beter Bed Holding N.V. operates as a retail- and wholesale organization in the bedroom furnishing sector. It offers beds, box springs, mattresses, bed bases, and bed textiles to consumers through its retail stores and web shops, as well as provides home delivery services. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 151 stores under the Beter Bed, Beddenreus, and SÃ¤ngjÃ¤tten brands. The company operates in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Sweden. Beter Bed Holding N.V. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Uden, the Netherlands.

BFIT.AS.summary: Basic-Fit N.V. operates fitness clubs in the Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, France, and Spain. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 905 fitness clubs. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Hoofddorp, the Netherlands.

CNV.PA.summary: Cnova N.V. operates as an e-commerce company in France and Western Europe. The company offers home appliances, consumer electronics, computers, home furnishings, and leisure and personal goods through its cdiscount.com Website, as well as through Cdiscount's showrooms. It also operates Cdiscount Voyages, a travel platform; Cdiscount Billetterie, a ticketing platform; Cdiscount Energie for home energy; Cdiscount Mobile for cell phone plans; and Cdiscount Immobilier, a real estate platform. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. Cnova N.V. is a subsidiary of Casino, Guichard-Perrachon S.A.

CNVAF.summary: Cnova N.V. operates as an e-commerce company in France and Western Europe. The company offers home appliances, consumer electronics, computers, home furnishings, and leisure and personal goods through its cdiscount.com Website, as well as through Cdiscount's showrooms. It also operates Cdiscount Voyages, a travel platform; Cdiscount Billetterie, a ticketing platform; Cdiscount Energie for home energy; Cdiscount Mobile for cell phone plans; and Cdiscount Immobilier, a real estate platform. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. Cnova N.V. is a subsidiary of Casino, Guichard-Perrachon S.A.

D5P.F.summary: DP Eurasia N.V. operates corporate-owned and franchised stores under the Domino's Pizza brand in Turkey, Russia, Azerbaijan, and Georgia. The company offers pizza delivery and takeaway services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 771 stores, including 550 franchised stores and 221 corporate-owned stores. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

D5P.SG.short_name: DP Eurasia N.V. Aandelen op naa
D5P.SG.summary: DP Eurasia N.V. operates corporate-owned and franchised stores under the Domino's Pizza brand in Turkey, Russia, Azerbaijan, and Georgia. DPEU.L.summary: DP Eurasia N.V. operates corporate-owned and franchised stores under the Domino's Pizza brand in Turkey, Russia, Azerbaijan, and Georgia. The company offers pizza delivery and takeaway services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 771 stores, including 550 franchised stores and 221 corporate-owned stores. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

EXO.MI.summary: Exor N.V., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the reinsurance, luxury goods, automotive, agricultural equipment, construction equipment, commercial vehicles, and professional football businesses. The company reinsures agriculture, aviation/space, casualty, catastrophe, energy, engineering, financial, marine, motor, multiline, and property risks, as well as offers mortality, longevity, accident and health, and alternative risk products. It also provides vehicles for the mass-market under the Chrysler, Dodge, Fiat, Fiat Professional, Jeep, Lancia, and Ram brands, as well as the SRT performance vehicles; luxury vehicles under the Maserati brand; related service parts and accessories, as well as service contracts under the Mopar brand for the mass-market; and retail and dealer financing, leasing, and rental services. In addition, the company operates in the components and production systems sectors under the Teksid and Comau brands; designs, engineers, produces, and sells luxury performance sports cars under the Ferrari brand; and manages professional football teams. Further, it designs, produces, markets, sells, and finances agricultural and construction equipment; trucks, commercial vehicles, and buses; and firefighting, defense, and other vehicles; and engines, axles, and transmissions solutions for vehicles, as well as engines for marine and power generation applications. Additionally, the company publishes The Economist newspaper; and offers magazines, and conference and electronic services. It operates in the Netherlands, the United States, Brazil, Canada, Poland, Serbia, Turkey, Mexico, Argentina, the Czech Republic, India, China, Australia, and South Africa. The company is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. Exor N.V. is a subsidiary of Giovanni Agnelli B.V.

FAST.AS.summary: Fastned B.V. constructs and operates charging stations for electric vehicles in the Netherlands, Germany, and internationally. It also engages in the commercial operation of chargers at charging stations. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. Fastned B.V. is a subsidiary of Fastned Administratie Stichting.

FSF.F.summary: Fastned B.V. constructs and operates charging stations for electric vehicles in the Netherlands, Germany, and internationally. Fastned B.V. is a subsidiary of Fastned Administratie Stichting.

HDG.AS.summary: Hunter Douglas N.V. manufactures and sells window coverings and architectural products in Europe, North America, Latin America, Asia, and Australia. It operates through Window Coverings and Architectural Products segments. The Window Coverings segment offers fabric and honeycomb shades, privacy sheers, and roman and roller shades for commercial and residential use. This segment also provides integrated and premium line of window covering styles, including venetian and vertical blinds; roman, roller, pleated, and woven wood shades; wood and alternative wood blinds; custom shutters; exterior venetian blinds; sunscreen blinds; shutters; and awnings. The Architectural Products segment offers architectural products comprising sun control solutions, suspended ceilings, terracotta faÃ§ades, ventilated faÃ§ade systems, and translucent architectural solutions primarily for commercial use. The company offers its products primarily under the HunterDouglas, Luxaflex, Levolor, Hillarys, Duette, Silhouette, Vignette, Pirouette, Luminette, Sonnette, QuadroClad, Luxalon, NBK, Techstyle, and 3form brands. Hunter Douglas N.V. sells its products through a network of independent and 87 company-owned fabricators. The company was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Rotterdam, the Netherlands.

JET.L.summary: Just Eat Takeaway.com N.V. operates an online food delivery marketplace. The company focuses on connecting consumers and restaurants through its platforms. It serves in the United Kingdom, Germany, Canada, the Netherlands, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Denmark, France, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Luxembourg, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, and Switzerland, as well as through partnerships in Colombia and Brazil. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

It serves in the United Kingdom, Germany, Canada, the Netherlands, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Denmark, France, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Luxembourg, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, and Switzerland, as well as through partnerships in Colombia and Brazil. K3E.F.summary: Kendrion N.V. develops, manufactures, and markets electromagnetic systems and components for industrial and automotive applications in Germany, rest of Europe, the Americas, Asia, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Industrial and Automotive. The Industrial segment offers switching, linear, locking, holding, door, oscillating, elevator brake, rotary, and custom solenoids; and industrial control systems to optimize automatic processes with pneumatics, fluid, solenoid, and control technologies. This segment also provides electromagnetic brakes for industrial safety, fire protection, elevators, appliances, wind turbines and aircrafts; and microvalves for water cleaning. The Automotive segment offers electromagnetic components and solutions as well as control units for use in active suspension systems, thermal management systems, fuel systems, acoustic vehicle alerting systems, sensor cleaning systems, transmission systems, and mobile hydraulics; and electronic systems and components for use in buses and trucks, as well as in construction and agricultural vehicles. The company was formerly known as Schuttersveld N.V. and changed its name to Kendrion N.V. in 2001. Kendrion N.V. was founded in 1859 and is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

KENDR.AS.summary: Kendrion N.V. develops, manufactures, and markets electromagnetic systems and components for industrial and automotive applications in Germany, rest of Europe, the Americas, Asia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Schuttersveld N.V. and changed its name to Kendrion N.V. in 2001. Kendrion N.V. was founded in 1859 and is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

N9VA.SG.summary: Kids Brands House N.V., formerly known as Nanoventure N.V., is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in start-up, early venture, mid venture, PIPES, growth capital, and turnaround investments in medium-sized companies. The firm makes direct equity investments but will also consider silent partnerships and shareholder loans. Kids Brands House N.V invests in companies within the textile business focusing on companies across fashion in Germany and neighboring countries. The firm seeks to invest out of balance sheet and takes majority and minority stake in the portfolio companies. Kids Brands House N.V. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Waalre, The Netherlands.

PPH.L.short_name: PPHE HOTEL GROUP LIMITED ORD NP
PPH.L.summary: PPHE Hotel Group Limited owns, develops, leases, operates, and franchises full-service upscale and lifestyle hotels in the Netherlands, Germany, Hungary, Serbia, Croatia, and the United Kingdom. It owns and operates hotels and resorts under the Park Plaza, the art'otel, and the Arena Campsites brands, as well as the Arena Hotels & Apartments. As of December 30, 2020, the company owned/operated 37 hotels and resorts with approximately 8,800 rooms; and 8 campsites offering approximately 6,000 units in central London. It also operates restaurants and bars; and coffee shop and Spa. The company was formerly known as Park Plaza Hotels Limited and changed its name to PPHE Hotel Group Limited in March 2012. PPHE Hotel Group Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

SNOW.AS.summary: SnowWorld N.V. owns and operates indoor ski resorts. It also operates a hotel comprising 100 rooms and 420 beds; indoor skydive center; and winter sports specialist shops. The company operates in Landgraaf, Zoetermeer, Amsterdam, Rucphen, and Terneuzen, the Netherlands, as well as in Neuss in Germany. SnowWorld N.V. was founded in 1996 and is based in Zoetermeer, the Netherlands.

STLA.MI.summary: Stellantis N.V. engages in the design, engineering, manufacture, distribution, and sale of passenger vehicles, pickup trucks, SUVs, and light commercial vehicles worldwide. It offers luxury, premium, and mainstream vehicles, as well as financial services, and parts and services; and provides retail and dealer financing, leasing, and rental services. The company offers its products under the Abarth, Alfa Romeo, Chrysler, Dodge, Fiat, Fiat Professional, Jeep, Maserati, Opel, Ram, Free2Move, CitroÃ«n, DS Automobiles, Lancia, Mopar, Peugeot, Vauxhall, and Leasys brands. The company sells its products directly, as well as through distributors and dealers. Stellantis N.V. was founded in 1899 and is based in Lijnden, the Netherlands.

STRN.AS.summary: Stern Groep N.V. operates as an automotive retail and services company in the Netherlands. The company operates through Dealergroup Stern, Stern Mobility Solutions, Stern Car Services, and Other segments. The Dealergroup Stern segment engages in the sale of new and used passenger cars and light commercial vehicles; and provision of maintenance and repair services for passenger cars and light commercial vehicles. The Stern Mobility Solutions segment provides car rental, fleet management, and e-mobility services, as well as sells financial and other mobility products to small and medium-sized enterprises. The Stern Car Services segment offers car body repair and passenger cars maintenance services; and interiors fitting services for light commercial vehicles. The company also provides used-car warranty, car insurance, and lettering services, as well as parts. It sells cars under various brands, including Abarth, Alfa Romeo, Dacia, Fiat, Ford, Jaguar, Jeep, Kia, Land Rover, Mercedes-Benz, Mitsubishi Motors, Nissan, Opel, Renault, Smart, Subaru, and Volvo. Stern Groep N.V. is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

T5W.DE.summary: Just Eat Takeaway.com N.V. operates an online food delivery marketplace. The company focuses on connecting consumers and restaurants through its platforms. It serves in the United Kingdom, Germany, Canada, the Netherlands, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Denmark, France, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Luxembourg, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, and Switzerland, as well as through partnerships in Colombia and Brazil. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
